abstract: The ability to compartmentalize software into sections that can be worked on one at a time will likely change how coders work. But that’s not necessarily a bad thing.
snippet: The ability to compartmentalize software into sections that can be worked on one at a time will likely change how coders work. But that’s not necessarily a bad thing.
lead_paragraph: Are software makers writing themselves out of a good living?

headline.main: Why Software ‘Containers’ Won’t Be Bad News for Programmers
